verses.verse: The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2518>Hilkiah,<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that were in <S%H6068>Anathoth<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin:<s%>

To <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H526>Amon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> in the <S%H7969>thirteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4427>reign.<s%>

It <S%H1961>came<s%> also in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> to the <S%H8537>end<s%> of the <S%H6240>eleventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> to the <S%H1540>carrying<s%> away of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H1540>captive<s%> in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>
Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H2962>Before<s%> I <S%H3335>formed<s%> you in the <S%H990>belly<s%> I <S%H3045>knew<s%> you; and <S%H2962>before<s%> you <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H7358>womb<s%> I <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> you, and I <S%H5414>ordained<s%> you a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
Then <S%H559>said<s%> I, <S%H162>Ah,<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD!<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H1696>speak:<s%> for I am a <S%H5288>child.<s%>

But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H559>Say<s%> not, I am a <S%H5288>child:<s%> for you shall <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> that I shall <S%H7971>send<s%> you, and <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you you shall <S%H1696>speak.<s%>
Be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of their <S%H6440>faces:<s%> for I am with you to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7971>put<s%> <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H5060>touched<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%> And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H5414>put<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> in your <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

<S%H7200>See,<s%> I have <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6485>set<s%> you <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms,<s%> to <S%H5428>root<s%> out, and to <S%H5422>pull<s%> down, and to <S%H6>destroy,<s%> and to <S%H2040>throw<s%> <S%H2040>down,<s%> to <S%H1129>build,<s%> and to <S%H5193>plant.<s%>

Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> you? And I <S%H559>said,<s%> I <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H4731>rod<s%> of an <S%H8247>almond<s%> tree.
Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to me, You have <S%H3190>well<s%> <S%H7200>seen:<s%> for I will <S%H8245>hasten<s%> my <S%H1697>word<s%> to <S%H6213>perform<s%> it.

And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me the <S%H8145>second<s%> time, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> you? And I <S%H559>said,<s%> I <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H5301>seething<s%> <S%H5518>pot;<s%> and the <S%H6440>face<s%> thereof is <S%H6440>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, Out of the <S%H6828>north<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> shall <S%H6605>break<s%> forth on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

For, <S%H2009>see,<s%> I will <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H6828>north,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and they shall <S%H935>come,<s%> and they shall <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> at the <S%H6607>entering<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2346>walls<s%> thereof <S%H5439>round<s%> about, and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

And I will <S%H1696>utter<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them <S%H5921>touching<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H7451>wickedness,<s%> who have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> me, and have <S%H6999>burned<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> to <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshipped<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> of their own <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

You therefore <S%H2296>gird<s%> up your <S%H4975>loins,<s%> and <S%H6965>arise,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> to them <S%H3605>all<s%> that I <S%H6680>command<s%> you: be not <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> at their <S%H6440>faces,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> I <S%H2865>confound<s%> you <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

For, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I have <S%H5414>made<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%> a <S%H4013>defended<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and an <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H5982>pillar,<s%> and <S%H5178>brazen<s%> <S%H2346>walls<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> against the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> against the <S%H8269>princes<s%> thereof, against the <S%H3548>priests<s%> thereof, and against the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And they shall <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> you; but they shall not <S%H3201>prevail<s%> against you; for I am with you, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you.
